name: VR Hockey League
description:
VR Hockey League - the most realistic hockey training simulator for virtual reality devices.

Check yourself in the challenges, based on real hockey training. Improve your skills and collect a full collection of awards at the VR Hockey League Hall of Fame.

Experiment with physics, experience the pleasure of realism in controlling the puck, score goals in many ways.

The game is suitable for beginners in hockey. You can play by just one hand.

  • Sensation of presence on the hockey ground
  • A protracted competitive process
  • Attention to detail
  • Realistic physics of possession of the puck
  • Tested by real hockey players
